# The Colony Concrete Co
> Professional concrete contractors serving The Colony, TX and the DFW metroplex

## About
The Colony Concrete Co provides professional concrete services including driveways, patios, foundations, flooring, retaining walls, and commercial concrete work. We serve The Colony and the greater Dallas-Fort Worth area.

## Contact
- Phone: (469) 972-8639
- Email: sales@thecolonyconcreteco.com
- Address: 415 Sir Torin Ln, The Colony, TX 75056
- Website: https://thecolonyconcreteco.com

## Services
- Concrete Driveways - Installation, replacement, stamped, decorative
- Concrete Patios - Custom designs, stamped concrete, pool decks
- Concrete Foundations - Slab foundations, pier & beam, repairs
- Concrete Flooring - Polished, epoxy, stained, overlays
- Retaining Walls - Block walls, poured concrete, decorative
- Commercial Concrete - Parking lots, sidewalks, foundations
- Industrial Concrete - Warehouse floors, heavy equipment pads

## Service Areas
The Colony, Frisco, Plano, Lewisville, Little Elm, Carrollton, Flower Mound, McKinney, Allen, Prosper, Celina, Castle Hills, Highland Village, Coppell, Hebron, Addison, Richardson, Murphy, Wylie, Fairview

## Hours
Monday-Friday: 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

## Key Information
- Licensed and insured Texas contractor
- 15+ years of experience
- Free estimates available
- Serving residential and commercial customers
- Quality materials and workmanship guaranteed
